title: Software Engineering
text: I love the challenge of software engineering—breaking down complex problems, writing clean code, and designing systems that are both efficient and impactful. It’s where creativity meets logic, and I thrive in that space.

title: Machine Learning
text: I’m drawn to machine learning because it’s like teaching machines to think—turning raw data into systems that can learn, adapt, and solve problems in ways that feel almost human.

title: Data Science
text: Data science excites me because it’s about finding stories hidden in numbers. I love the process of digging into messy datasets, uncovering patterns, and turning them into actionable insights that can shape decisions.
